org.hbase.async

Class ScanFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hbase.async.ScanFilter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColumnPaginationFilter, ColumnPrefixFilter, ColumnRangeFilter, CompareFilter, FilterList, FirstKeyOnlyFilter, FuzzyRowFilter, KeyOnlyFilter, KeyRegexpFilter, MultipleColumnPrefixFilter, TimestampsFilter

    public abstract class ScanFilter
extends Object
    Abstract base class for Scanner filters.

    These filters are executed on the server side, inside the RegionServer, while scanning. They are useful to prune uninteresting data before it gets to the network, but remember that the RegionServer still has to load the data before it can know whether the filter passes or not, so it's generally not efficient to filter out large amounts of data.

    Subclasses are guaranteed to be immutable and are thus thread-safe as well as usable concurrently on multiple Scanner instances.

    Since:
    1.5

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
